input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Gewirtz 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='2 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Decorative Pinecones and Burlap Base'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 3' Snowed Grand Teton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and 111 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Slim Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 8.5' White Salem Pencil Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Millville Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Nearly Natural Layered Washington Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5' Pre-Lit Artificial Meadowlark Pencil Hinged Tree'
  - Name='7.5ft Puleo Pre-Lit Flocked Slim Royal Majestic Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree Clear Lights'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 6ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas'
  - Name='National Tree Company Montgomery 6' Prelit Half Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 10' Pre-Lit Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Yorkshire Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4' Green Pine Trees Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Hudson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 4' Pre-Lit Mixed Classic Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo 4.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit Natural Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 5 ft. Snowy Downswept Forestree with Clear Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gewirtz 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and type (Fir Christmas tree) with pre-lit lights, but lacks details on branch technology or downswept style, limiting full relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 2 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Decorative Pinecones and Burlap Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size and includes decorative pinecones and burlap base, differing significantly in scale and possibly construction from reference tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also an artificial tree but of Alpine type, which may differ in shape and branch style, and lacks pre-lit light details and downswept branch info.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 3' Snowed Grand Teton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and 111 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with lights and bendable branches; smaller size and snowed effect differs from downswept Douglas Fir, but similar function and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Slim Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, larger fir tree with pre-lit lights and hinged branches like the reference; similar construction and function with slight shape difference (slim).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type, likely similar construction although lighting and branch technology details unspecified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 8.5' White Salem Pencil Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different pine species with pencil shape which differs markedly from downswept Douglas Fir silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Millville Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar height pre-lit tree; details about branch type or style missing but likely similar purpose and build quality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree 7.5'
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type, slightly taller, but no info on lights or branch construction; comparable category and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Layered Washington Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree type (Spruce) with layered construction, likely different silhouette and branch style from downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5' Pre-Lit Artificial Meadowlark Pencil Hinged Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pre-lit, hinged branches, pencil shaped which differs from downswept but shares key construction and lighting features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7.5ft Puleo Pre-Lit Flocked Slim Royal Majestic Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit slim spruce tree with flocked needles, differs in species and silhouette but similar lighting and hinged branch features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 6ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species and height close to reference, snow flocked but pre-lit with slim profile, somewhat different silhouette but similar functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Montgomery 6' Prelit Half Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Half tree shape differs significantly in silhouette and use despite being pre-lit and same brand; functional difference lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 10' Pre-Lit Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical tree type, construction, branch technology, downswept style, pre-lit with Feel Real tips, just taller and with dual color LEDs; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Yorkshire Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but snowy effect and Yorkshire tree type likely differ in branch style and silhouette from downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4' Green Pine Trees Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller size and pine species differ substantially from reference downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine species likely with different shape and branch style; no detail on lights or hinge branches; dissimilar silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Hudson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height fir tree pre-lit with warm LEDs; likely similar function but brand and details on branch tech unspecified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4' Pre-Lit Mixed Classic Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller mixed pine tree, differs in species, size, and possibly silhouette and construction from downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 4.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller pre-lit tree but lacks species and branch style details; size and unspecified features limit relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit Natural Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand, pre-lit fir tree with likely similar construction but different species (Fraser Fir) and taller than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 5 ft. Snowy Downswept Forestree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same downswept branch style and pre-lit lights, same brand, but smaller size and snowy effect distinguishes it somewhat from reference.
